def test_add_group_db(app, db, json_groups): group = json_groups with pytest.allure.step('Given a group list'): old_groups = db.get_group_list() with pytest.allure.step('When I add a group %s to the list' % group): app.group.create(group) with pytest.allure.step('Then the new group list is equal to the old list with the added group'): new_groups = db.get_group_list() old_groups.append(group) > assert sorted(old_groups, key=Group.id_or_max) == sorted(new_groups, key=Group.id_or_max) E assert [1:test::, 2:... iG l-8q, ...] == [1:test::, 2::... iG l-8q, ...] E At index 82 diff: None:name\4ds:header Z"q#4* meiil}Qt):footerNMjL ^= b != 84:name4ds:header Z"q#4* meiil}Qt):footerNMjL ^= b E Use -v to get the full diff
